summary: EPIS update package status to external
description: EPIS update package status to external

query.name: packageCode
query.description: Unique package identifier generated by EPIS. Used to communicate between EPIS and external systems

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/logistics/epis/external/packages/statuses')
request.add_api_parameter("authorization", "Bearer XXX")
request.add_api_parameter("packageCode", "FU2520082700000000000001323743212")
request.add_api_parameter("externalOrderId", "FO073511135542999")
request.add_api_parameter("status", "delivered")
request.add_api_parameter("processTime", "1619681896000")
request.add_api_parameter("location", "Sort HCM")
request.add_api_parameter("reasonCode", "customer rejected at door step")
request.add_api_parameter("geoLocation", "{\"latitude\":\"10.7776331\",\"longitude\":\"106.7116815\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("properties", "{\"currentAttemptCount\":\"1\",\"originalTrackingNumber\":\"LEXST12345\",\"trackingUrl\":\"https://lazada/tracking-url\",\"partnerName\":\"Haravan\",\"receiverName\":\"Nguyen Van B\",\"lastFailedReasonCode\":\"CUSTOMER_HAS_NO_CASH_AVAILABLE\",\"fdSlaDates\":\"1701753612917\",\"exchangeVasStatus\":\"collected\",\"deliveryComment\":\"Fatama received and signed\",\"photos\":[\"https://lazada-oss/customer/proof-of-delivery\",\"https://lazada-oss/customer/proof-of-delivery\"],\"itemsDelivered\":[{\"quantity\":\"1\",\"platformItemId\":\"FP00564329958\"},{\"quantity\":\"1\",\"platformItemId\":\"FP00564329958\"}],\"epod\":[\"https://lazada-oss/customer/sign\",\"https://lazada-oss/customer/sign\"],\"fdFeeCollectionVasStatus\":\"collected\",\"fdStorageDays\":\"3\",\"recipientType\":\"customer\",\"partialDelivered\":\"true\",\"lastFailedDeliveryCount\":\"1\",\"vehicleNumber\":\"TEST_UAT_MotoXL\",\"driverName\":\"Nguyen Van A\",\"reAttemptAvailableDates\":[\"[\\\"2024-06-01\\\",\\\"2024-06-02\\\"]\",\"[\\\"2024-06-01\\\",\\\"2024-06-02\\\"]\"],\"platformName\":\"Haravan\",\"driverContact\":\"0977777111\",\"notifyVasFdStorage\":\"true\"}")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/logistics/epis/external/packages/statuses')
request.add_api_param('authorization', 'Bearer XXX')
request.add_api_param('packageCode', 'FU2520082700000000000001323743212')
request.add_api_param('externalOrderId', 'FO073511135542999')
request.add_api_param('status', 'delivered')
request.add_api_param('processTime', '1619681896000')
request.add_api_param('location', 'Sort HCM')
request.add_api_param('reasonCode', 'customer rejected at door step')
request.add_api_param('geoLocation', '{\"latitude\":\"10.7776331\",\"longitude\":\"106.7116815\"}')
request.add_api_param('properties', '{\"currentAttemptCount\":\"1\",\"originalTrackingNumber\":\"LEXST12345\",\"trackingUrl\":\"https://lazada/tracking-url\",\"partnerName\":\"Haravan\",\"receiverName\":\"Nguyen Van B\",\"lastFailedReasonCode\":\"CUSTOMER_HAS_NO_CASH_AVAILABLE\",\"fdSlaDates\":\"1701753612917\",\"exchangeVasStatus\":\"collected\",\"deliveryComment\":\"Fatama received and signed\",\"photos\":[\"https://lazada-oss/customer/proof-of-delivery\",\"https://lazada-oss/customer/proof-of-delivery\"],\"itemsDelivered\":[{\"quantity\":\"1\",\"platformItemId\":\"FP00564329958\"},{\"quantity\":\"1\",\"platformItemId\":\"FP00564329958\"}],\"epod\":[\"https://lazada-oss/customer/sign\",\"https://lazada-oss/customer/sign\"],\"fdFeeCollectionVasStatus\":\"collected\",\"fdStorageDays\":\"3\",\"recipientType\":\"customer\",\"partialDelivered\":\"true\",\"lastFailedDeliveryCount\":\"1\",\"vehicleNumber\":\"TEST_UAT_MotoXL\",\"driverName\":\"Nguyen Van A\",\"reAttemptAvailableDates\":[\"[\\\"2024-06-01\\\",\\\"2024-06-02\\\"]\",\"[\\\"2024-06-01\\\",\\\"2024-06-02\\\"]\"],\"platformName\":\"Haravan\",\"driverContact\":\"0977777111\",\"notifyVasFdStorage\":\"true\"}')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
